errors.name: QuestionTooLong
errors.msg: Question exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: InvalidDeadlines
errors.msg: Betting end time must be before resolution end time

errors.name: DeadlineInPast
errors.msg: Deadline cannot be in the past

errors.name: MarketNotOpen
errors.msg: Market is not open for betting

errors.name: BettingNotStarted
errors.msg: Betting period has not started yet

errors.name: BettingEnded
errors.msg: Betting period has ended

errors.name: BettingNotEnded
errors.msg: Betting period has not ended yet

errors.name: MarketNotResolved
errors.msg: Market has not been resolved

errors.name: MarketAlreadyResolved
errors.msg: Market has already been resolved

errors.name: MarketNotCancelled
errors.msg: Market is not cancelled

errors.name: InvalidMarketStatus
errors.msg: Invalid market status for this operation

errors.name: InvalidBetAmount
errors.msg: Bet amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidEncryptedBetSize
errors.msg: Encrypted bet data size is invalid

errors.name: InvalidOutcome
errors.msg: Invalid outcome - must be 0 (NO) or 1 (YES)

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Position has already been claimed

errors.name: NoPayout
errors.msg: No payout available for this position

errors.name: PayoutNotComputed
errors.msg: Payout has not been computed yet

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized - only market authority can perform this action

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountOwner
errors.msg: Invalid token account owner

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Token mint does not match market

errors.name: InvalidVault
errors.msg: Vault does not match market

errors.name: InvalidPoolState
errors.msg: Pool state does not match market

errors.name: InvalidPosition
errors.msg: Position does not belong to this market

errors.name: PoolStateNotInitialized
errors.msg: Pool state has not been initialized

errors.name: EncryptedStateTooLarge
errors.msg: Encrypted state exceeds maximum size

errors.name: ComputationAborted
errors.msg: Computation was aborted

errors.name: ClusterNotSet
errors.msg: Cluster not set in MXE account

errors.name: InvalidComputationResult
errors.msg: Invalid computation result

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: Underflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic underflow

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: ComputePayoutOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: Epoch
docs: The network epoch

types.name: MXEAccount
docs: A MPC Execution Environment.

types.name: MxeStatus
docs: The status of an MXE.

types.name: NodeMetadata
docs: location as [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html) country code

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current
epoch.

types.name: Output
docs: An output of a computation.
We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via
data objects.

types.name: Parameter
docs: A parameter of a computation.
We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: ProcessBetOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: SetUnset
docs: Utility struct to store a value that needs to be set by a certain number of participants (keys
in our case). Once all participants have set the value, the value is considered set and we only
store it once.
